summary: After losing his job, his car and his money, Phuchit, Krissada Sukosol, races against time to complete 13 tasks ordered by an anonymous caller who promised 100,000,000 Thai Baht upon completion.
cast: Krissada Sukosol|Achita Sikamana|Sarunyu Wongkrachang|Nattapong Arunnate|Namfon Pakdee|Piyapan Choopech|Philip Wilson|Sukanya Kongkawong|Nakarin Triemmareng|Chano Pemberger|Stuart Nombluez|Suttipong Satjachoktam|Nuttakrit Boonannatanasarn|Chanunpong Peungrargdee|Pasnani Chinsatapornchok|Ittipol Silaorn|Pongsanart Vinsiri|Ple Pised|Pawittra Buranankorn|Ekkachai Sengprieng|Suthon Wechkama|Phusanisa Kitikriengkrai|Panisara Arayaskul|Pawenooch Pangnakorn|Lawan Hiwpong|Nontapat Worratammatip|Sahatsawat Thonginn|Titanart Fhasawang|Boogburg Jatkarn|Damrongsak Ruengsri|Damrongpol Ruengsri|Anucha Kansa|Panayakorn Sornmayura|Aumnuay Inntarachai|Burin Supapan|Sumran Junkong|Phuttiphong Preedaned|Jaruwat Thongboran|Chalongrat Thongkam|Tanespol Wisitchanachai|Poon Tabthong|Nuttakit Soparp|Sarunya Chuenka|Ployparin Tamsut|Suppaluck Wiwattanamaythakul|Thonginn Rungsiri|Maytha Seritanawong|Pimol Chokgumnerd|Pit Imerb|Somsak Sararit|Pranee Junkaew|Wanlop Thientong|Pornchai Piboontanakeat|Aornsajee Silawan|Armornpol Jiemwongsirikul|Nuttaporn Junplengkeaw|Jumpa Klinkhom|Kasem Songkeaw|Nuttapach Somsup|Sompong Thawee|Kitti Kuremanee|Supat Keawkulwanich|Wuttichai Tookaew|Phaisarn Choorat|Paiboon Siri|Tuentanon Chankiat|Sittichai Phoomsirikorn|Thitipa Boonsook|Nawanun Bumroongruek|Sommart Chokmungmeepisarn|Ronnachai Sanguanthai|Sarawut Boatkhuntod|Chaiwat Boonleang|Natawut Kaewjanpetch|Panupol Krudsaisa-ard|Tawan Pansavat|Anont Youngdee|Chaisith Korsantiruk|Songklod Sathonhon|Adirach Khaochareow|Tossapol Khimpai|Isares Srilert|Kriangkrai Dasue|Gailawat Sukkaew|Neeranuch Khomsorn|Napalai Rengnarong|Siriluk Kitchanawong|Ousanee Songprakhon|Sarocha Gainart|Salaithip Charubhumi|Kingkarn Kerdkaew|Teemah Kanjanapairin|Atchara Mahayotsanun|Sujinda Zhartthog|Sananjit Bangsapan|Vorot Veerapunpong
director: Director: Chookiat Sakveerakul (as Matthew Chookiat Sakveerakul)
title: 13 game sayawng
